title: Blood born aatrox
body: make a cool looking aatrox skin blood born with alot of blood

replies.body: He already is blood born lol
i think he's talking about a blood lord skin, in theme with blood lord vladimir
Yeah, that would fit him really well. BLOOD LORD AATROX!!
Maybe but forsaken aatroxx would be better
Dude that sounds awesome. I hope Riot reads your post!
Ah Kos, or some say Kosm
